alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 3:15AM CDT until March 31 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CDT FOR DALE...NORTHEASTERN COFFEE AND NORTHWESTERN HOUSTON COUNTIES... At 315 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ariton to near Daleville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Enterprise, Dothan, Midland City, Level Plains, Newton, Ariton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Ewell, Roeton, Cairns Aaf, Dale County Lake and Phillips Crossroads. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for southeastern Alabama. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
